question: Out of Capital of Akbar’s Kingdom, Buland Darwaja , Panch Mahal and Akbar’s Mausoleum , which are located at the same place?
option2: Buland Darwaja , Panch Mahal and Akbar’s Mausoleum
option3: Capital of Akbar’s Kingdom, Buland Darwaja , Panch Mahal
option4: Capital of Akbar’s Kingdom and Akbar’s Mausoleum
answer: Capital of Akbar’s Kingdom, Buland Darwaja , Panch Mahal
explanation: Capital of Akbar Kingdom, Buland Darwaja , Panch Mahal  (all fatehpur sikri ) mausoleum at Sikandara
